name: Shingles Riverside Cottages

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was the last stop on an 8 day tour of Tasmania where we had been constantly impressed by the standard of the accommodation, but this place took the position as 'complete favourite'. The decor and ambiance were so inviting and comfortable, not to mention stylish too! We originally stayed here because there was little accommodation in Hobart and I'd definitely recommend the location. It's 45 minutes outside Hobart in an area that is worth visting anyway. It's tranquil and peaceful but has enough facilities (supermarkets etc) nearby, which you'll need if you're going to be using the bbq! Loved it, would definitely recommend.
reviews.title: 5* from start to finish

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: this place is worth it! its such great value for 130. you have your own modernly decorated cottage which has a couch with tv, kitchen w/ table and chairs, and all utensils,etc. breakfast provisions are given, the bathroom is clean and well layed out and the bed is absolutely incredible. there are even lights on the step up to the bed illuminating it. super comfortable too. the entire place appears to be brand new. theres a stone garden area outside of your place and an area to park the car, walk thru the back yard and you're at a little pier right on the derwent river, a beautiful place to watch the sunset...when we were there the heated pool wasn't working..but that would've been quite nice too. very nice hosts also. highly recommend it!
reviews.title: absolutely amazing!

likes.liked: — very modern decor, right on river, very very friendly hosts, fun place to stay
likes.disliked: — drive way in is super steep, watch out!

aka: Shingles Riverside Cottages New Norfolk, Tasmania
description: Enchanting fully self contained cottages on the banks of the spectacular Derwent River set in 2 acres of tranquil, private gardens with solar heated in ground swimming pool, private jetty and barbeque facilities. A short 2 minute drive to the town centre of New Norfolk, 30 minutes to Hobart and 45 to airport with all of Southern Tasmania's tourist attractions within easy traveling time, making this an ideal base for your holiday. A stunning location.
